verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> The <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4639>working<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> but on the <S%H3117>sabbath<s%> <S%H7676><s%> it shall be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> it shall be <S%H6605>opened.<s%>

And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H4480>without,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> and shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4201>post<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H853><s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and he shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate:<s%> then he shall go <S%H3318>forth;<s%> but the <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

Likewise the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> and in the new <S%H2320>moons.<s%>

And the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

And the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as he shall be able to <S%H4991>give,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

And in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> it shall be a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram:<s%> they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish.<s%>

And he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> according <S%H834>as<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H5381>attain<s%> unto, and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

And when the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>enter,<s%> he shall go <S%H935>in<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> thereof.

But when the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the solemn <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> he that entereth <S%H935>in<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and he that <S%H935>entereth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> he came <S%H935>in,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> over <S%H5227>against<s%> it.
And the <S%H5387>prince<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them, when they go <S%H935>in,<s%> shall go <S%H935>in;<s%> and when they go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

And in the <S%H2282>feasts<s%> and in the <S%H4150>solemnities<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> to a <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> to a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and to the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as he is able to <S%H4991>give,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

Now <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H5071>voluntary<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> <S%H5071>voluntarily<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> one shall then <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looketh<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east,<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H853><s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> on the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> then he shall go <S%H3318>forth;<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> his going <S%H3318>forth<s%> one shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> of the <S%H1121>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish:<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> it every <S%H1242>morning.<s%> <S%H1242><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> it every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H1242><s%> the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and the third <S%H7992>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> to <S%H7450>temper<s%> <S%H853><s%> with the fine <S%H5560>flour;<s%> a meat <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Thus shall they <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> and the meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H1242><s%> for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> unto <S%H376>any<s%> of his <S%H4480>sons,<s%> <S%H1121><s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> thereof shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H1121>sons';<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> shall be their <S%H272>possession<s%> by <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> he <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> of his <S%H4480>inheritance<s%> <S%H5159><s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H4480>servants,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> then it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1865>liberty;<s%> after it shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H5387>prince:<s%> <S%H389>but<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> for them.

Moreover the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> take of the people's inheritance by <S%H3947>oppression,<s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5159><s%> to thrust them <S%H3238>out<s%> of their <S%H4480>possession;<s%> <S%H272><s%> but he shall <S%H853>give<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> out of his own <S%H4480>possession:<s%> <S%H272><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> <S%H834><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6327>scattered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H4480>possession.<s%> <S%H272><s%>

After he <S%H935>brought<s%> me through the <S%H3996>entry,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>chambers<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> which <S%H6437>looked<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> was a <S%H4725>place<s%> on the two <S%H3411>sides<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> <S%H853><s%> the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they shall <S%H644>bake<s%> the meat <S%H4503>offering;<s%> that they bear them not <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H1115><s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2435>utter<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and caused me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H413>by<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> in every corner of the <S%H4740>court<s%> <S%H2691><s%> <S%H2691><s%> <S%H4740><s%> <S%H2691><s%> there was a <S%H2691>court.<s%>

In the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> there were <S%H2691>courts<s%> <S%H7000>joined<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7341>broad:<s%> these <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7106>corners<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

And there was a <S%H2905>row<s%> of building round <S%H5439>about<s%> in them, round <S%H5439>about<s%> them <S%H702>four,<s%> and it was <S%H6213>made<s%> with boiling <S%H4018>places<s%> <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H2918>rows<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1004>places<s%> of them that <S%H1310>boil,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
